issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: The event handling thread in AsyncDispatcher is a critical thread in RM. We should set UncaughtExceptionHandler introduced in YARN-6061 for it.
fields.summary: Set UncaughtExceptionHandler for event handling thread in AsyncDispatcher

comments.body: The problem is AsyncDispatcher is in yarn common, but RMCriticalThreadUncaughtExceptionHandler is in yarn server. Seems like we need an interface to make it happen.

Uploaded patch 001. Make {{RMCriticalThreadUncaughtExceptionHandler}} inherit from {{YarnUncaughtExceptionHandler}}, so that {{AsyncDispatcher}} doesn't need to deal with {{RMCriticalThreadUncaughtExceptionHandler}} directly.
